title: USB not Recognized for Pixel XL
content:
after the Android Pie update, seem that the USB preference notification didnt show on my status bar, when i search for the USB preference in Setting,  the "Use USB for" setting cannot be access even my device is connected to my laptop so my laptop didnt recognised the USB connection of my Pixel XL. i do try to use other data cable but seem it isnt working, at all.

_kindly please inform this problem cause I have to use my device for my upcoming project for mobile app development :')
